wikipedia_page.main: Anthony Alexander Jarrett (born 13 August 1968 in Enfield, London) is a male former sprint and hurdling athlete from England.

response: *  1968   – Tony Jarrett, English sprinter and hurdler

In the 4 × 100 m relay event Christie's performance as anchor, alongside Colin Jackson, Tony Jarrett and John Regis, set a European record of 37.77 s at the 1993 World Championships. This was beaten six years later by a 37.73 s run by a British team, which included his protégé Darren Campbell.United Kingdom all-time lists men gbrathletics; Retrieved 2008-01-20 However, Christie's team's performance is still the second fastest 4 x 100 m performance by a European team and one of the best by a non-United States relay team.4x100 Metres Relay All Time IAAF Retrieved on 2008-01-20
*Episode 3 – John Regis and Tony Jarrett – 7 November 1996
